Package com.flipkart.dao

Interface CustomerDAOInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
CustomerDAOImplementation
public interface CustomerDAOInterface
CustomerDAOInterface defines the data access operations related to customers, including managing user passwords, booking slots, retrieving gym information, and managing user information.

  • Method Details

    • updateGymUserPassword

      boolean updateGymUserPassword(String email, String password, String updatedPassword)
      Updates the password for a gym user.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the user.
      password - The current password of the user.
      updatedPassword - The new password to be set.
      Returns:
      true if the password was successfully updated, false otherwise.

    • verifyGymUserPassword

      boolean verifyGymUserPassword(String email, String password)
      Verifies the password of a gym user.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the user.
      password - The password of the user.
      Returns:
      true if the password is correct, false otherwise.

    • getAllGyms

      List<Gym> getAllGyms()
      Retrieves a list of all gyms.
      Returns:
      A list of all gyms.

    • bookSlot

      boolean bookSlot(int gymId, int time, String email)
      Books a slot at a specified gym for a given time and user.
      Parameters:
      gymId - The ID of the gym.
      time - The time slot to be booked.
      email - The email of the user booking the slot.
      Returns:
      true if the slot was successfully booked, false otherwise.

    • getAllBookingByUserID

      List<Bookings> getAllBookingByUserID(String userId)
      Retrieves all bookings for a given user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user whose bookings are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of all bookings made by the user.

    • cancelBooking

      boolean cancelBooking(int bookingId)
      Cancels a slot booking based on the booking ID.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - The ID of the booking to be cancelled.
      Returns:
      true if the booking was successfully cancelled, false otherwise.

    • validateUser

      boolean validateUser(String username, String pass)
      Validates a user by checking the provided username and password.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user.
      pass - The password of the user.
      Returns:
      true if the username and password are valid, false otherwise.

    • createUser

      boolean createUser(User user)
      Creates a new user.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object containing the user's information.
      Returns:
      true if the user was successfully created, false otherwise.
